entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Sydenham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:24 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning near midnight. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
